sentences.english: Saturday and Sunday are defined by a sense of new beginning.
sentences.chinese: 週六及週日對你來說又是一個新的開始。

sentences.english: John took park in a Singing Competition last Saturday!
sentences.chinese: 約翰上週六參加了一次歌詠比賽。

sentences.english: On late Saturday night, there is a full dress rehearsal.
sentences.chinese: 在週六晚上，有一個全晚裝彩排。

sentences.english: On Sunday, I could play with my dog BaiBai in here.
sentences.chinese: 在週六，我會和我的狗貝貝在這裏玩耍。

sentences.english: The sky glowed Saturday and a thin dusting of sand covered Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 北京週六天空灰濛濛的，到處是薄薄的揚沙塵土。

sentences.english: Therefore, Jay and David said goodbye to each other and promised to get together again on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 因此，阿杰跟戴維彼此告別，並相約週六再見。

sentences.english: For Walcott and Gervinho a decision will be made on Saturday or Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 至於沃爾科特和熱爾維尼奧，週六或週日將有定論。

sentences.english: Thursday through Saturday, you're nearly blindsided by a huge issue at home.
sentences.chinese: 週四到週六，你會忽視家裏的一件大事。

sentences.english: There will be a memorial service for Leeward at the airport Saturday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 機場將於週六下午爲李瓦德舉行追悼會。

sentences.english: His commander told everyone on Saturday also want to training, everyone was very unhappy.
sentences.chinese: 分隊長告訴大家週六也要訓練，大家非常不高興。

sentences.english: The United States Navy destroyer Barry fired Tomahawk missiles from the Mediterranean Sea on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 週六，美國海軍驅逐艦巴里從地中海發射戰斧導彈。

sentences.english: Wilshere started against Juventus on Saturday and went close with a volley in the first half.
sentences.chinese: 小威在週六與尤文的比賽中首發，上半場有一腳射門。

sentences.english: Can you tell me about the one on Saturday?
sentences.chinese: 你可以給我介紹一下週六的那一場嗎？

sentences.english: The initial image released Saturday was in black and white.
sentences.chinese: 上週六最初公佈的圖片是黑白照片。

sentences.english: Today, I and my classmates exchange Sunday and Saturday schedule.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我和同學一起交流週日和週六的日程。

sentences.english: But Pinewood hopes to break this on Saturday with the Tom Cruise film, which was made at the site in the 1990s.
sentences.chinese: 但是松林製片廠希望在週六打破這個記錄。

definition: time of business/opening hours (of shop)/working time

pinyin: Wei2 duo1 li4 ya4 Gong1 yuan2
